add(address[],address[]).details: Sets `_oracles` for `underlyings`. Caller of this function must make sure that the oracles being added return non-stale, greater than 0 prices for all underlying tokens.

params._chainlinkOracle: The underlying ERC20 token addresses to link to `_oracles`.
params._oracles: The `PriceOracle` contracts to be assigned to `underlyings`.
params._underlyings: The underlying ERC20 token addresses to link to `_oracles`.

price(address).details: Attempts to return the price in ETH of `underlying` (implements `BasePriceOracle`).

oracles.details: Maps underlying token addresses to oracle addresses.

userdoc.notice: This contract gets prices from an available oracle address which must implement IPriceFeed.sol If there's no oracle set, it will try getting the price from Chainlink's Oracle.
